author: Anton Petrov
description:
Support this channel on Patreon to help me make this a full time job: https://www.patreon.com/whatdamath (Unreleased videos, extra footage, DMs, no ads)

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a strange x-ray source revealed by NASA
Links:
https://science.nasa.gov/missions/hubble/nasas-hubble-chandra-spot-rare-type-of-black-hole-eating-a-star/
https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4357/adbbee/pdf

#xray #blackhole #nasa

0:00 Intermediate Mass Black Holes - IMBH 
2:40 Why so hard to find 
3:20 Previous confirmed detections 
4:20 ULX - Ultraluminous X Ray Sources 
6:00 NASA discover
title: Ridiculously Powerful X-Ray Source Found by NASA May Be an Elusive Black Hole Type
